title: CR-invariance of the Steinness index
summary:
We characterize the Diederich-Fornaess index and the Steinness index in terms
of a special 1-form, which we call D'Angelo 1-form. We then prove that the
Diederich-Fornaess and Steinness indices are invariant under CR-diffeomorphisms
by showing CR-invariance of D'Angelo 1-forms.
